definitions.definition: The stem or main axis of a plant .
examples: a stalk of wheat, rye, or oats;  the stalks of maize or hemp

definitions.definition: The petiole , pedicel , or peduncle of a plant.
Something resembling the stalk of a plant, such as the stem of a quill .
( architecture ) An ornament in the Corinthian capital resembling the stalk of a plant, from which the volutes and helices spring.
One of the two upright pieces of a ladder.

subdefinitions.definition: A stem or peduncle , as in certain barnacles and crinoids .
The narrow basal portion of the abdomen of a hymenopterous insect .
The peduncle of the eyes of decapod crustaceans .

definitions.definition: ( metalworking ) An iron bar with projections inserted in a core to strengthen it; a core arbor.

( mathematics , sheaf theory ) Informally, a construction which generalizes that of the notion of the ring of germs of functions near a point to the context of arbitrary sheaves . Formally, given a sheaf F {\displaystyle {\mathcal {F}}} on a space X {\displaystyle X} , and a point x {\displaystyle x} in X {\displaystyle X} , the direct limit of the sections of F {\displaystyle F} on the open neighborhoods of x {\displaystyle x} ordered by reverse inclusion . See Stalk (sheaf) on  Wikipedia. Wikipedia

main_definition: The stem or main axis of a plant .

One of the two upright pieces of a ladder.
( metalworking ) An iron bar with projections inserted in a core to strengthen it; a core arbor.

( mathematics , sheaf theory ) Informally, a construction which generalizes that of the notion of the ring of germs of functions near a point to the context of arbitrary sheaves . Formally, given a sheaf F {\displaystyle {\mathcal {F}}} on a space X {\displaystyle X} , and a point x {\displaystyle x} in X {\displaystyle X} , the direct limit of the sections of F {\displaystyle F} on the open neighborhoods of x {\displaystyle x} ordered by reverse inclusion . See Stalk (sheaf) on  Wikipedia. Wikipedia

definitions.definition: A particular episode of trying to follow or contact someone.
The hunting of a wild animal by stealthy approach.

main_definition: A particular episode of trying to follow or contact someone.
secondary_definitions: The hunting of a wild animal by stealthy approach.
